page.title: 18TRANSPORT 5
page.content: Public bus services through the village are run by four local companies.These provide transport to Bath (one return journey per week), Yate (one return journey each week) and more frequently to Malmesbury and Chippenham. Those employed at the Linolite factory in Malmesbury and the Buxted Chicken factory in Sutton Benger are transported to work by bus. The children attending the Comprehensive School at Malmesbury and the Catholic School also travel by bus. The railway line running through the village is still used for passenger and freight trains.The station closed to passengers in 1961 and for freight in 1965.
